hero.heading: A Simple Bookmark Manager
hero.snippet: A clean and simple interface to organize your favorite websites. Open a new browser tab and see your sites load instantly. Try it for free.

features.heading: Features
features.snippet: Our aim is to make it quick and easy for you to access your favorite websites. your bookmarks sync between your devices so you can access them on the go.

tab_content.heading: Bookmark in one click
tab_content.snippet: Organize your bookmarks however you like. Our simple drag-and-drop interface give you complete control over how you manager your favorite sites.

tab_content.heading: Intelligent search
tab_content.snippet: Our powerful search feature will help you find saved sites in no times at all. No need to trawl through all of your bookmarks.

tab_content.heading: Share your bookmarks
tab_content.snippet: Easily share your bookmarks and collections with others. Create a shareable link that you can send at the click of a button.

integrations.heading: Download the extension
integrations.snippet: We've got more browsers in the pipeline. Please do let us know if you've got a favorite you'd like us to prioritize.

faqs.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faqs.snippet: Here are some of our FAQs. If you have any other questions you'd like answered please feel free to email us.
